bibl.title: Two Further Reminiscences of Callimachus Aetia frr. 67-75 in Eclogue 2? Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Argues that the known allusions to Callimachus' "Acontius and Cydippe" in Virgil's Eclogue 2 can be augmented by lines 56 and 58-9. - P. 50: Appendix: Sources of Callimachus' νοτίην ... πηγυλίδα / πιδυλίδα.
bibl.seg: CAIRNS Francis, Two Further Reminiscences of Callimachus Aetia frr. 67-75 in Eclogue 2? Avec résumé en anglais.

Argues that the known allusions to Callimachus' "Acontius and Cydippe" in Virgil's Eclogue 2 can be augmented by lines 56 and 58-9. - P. 50: Appendix: Sources of Callimachus' νοτίην ... πηγυλίδα / πιδυλίδα.
